mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure images and text scale better on smaller screens, consider testing with a wider range of devices for consistent rendering.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce unnecessary JavaScript to speed up page loading.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta tags, title tags, and alt text for images to enhance visibility on search engines.
userExperienceTip: Streamline navigation and make content more accessible by reducing excessive scrolling.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing the number of steps and providing clearer instructions.
